title: Specialized XC Tires get new block-in-block treads for Renegade, Fast Trak & Ground Control
content:
Continuing in their quest for increased speed, Specialized XC tires are getting an update upgrade. Taking inspiration from the world of motocross tires, the XC tire range gets new ‘block-in-block- tread patterns that claim to increase grip and durability. While the names might be similar, the tread patterns are all new. The Renegade is still meant to […]

The post Specialized XC Tires get new block-in-block treads for Renegade, Fast Trak & Ground Control appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
